value.query:
SELECT Id,
LastModifiedDate,
Name,
%vlocity_namespace%__Amount__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__AssetId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PostDate__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__TransactionDate__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__TransactionNumber__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c FROM %vlocity_namespace%__AssetTransaction__c  WHERE  %vlocity_namespace%__AssetId__c = '{{params.id}}'
